main.name: Matthew Ricklefs
main.bio: To be a Junior Developer, I would like to learn how to create interpersonal relationships and be able to foster a cooperative mentality. I am very well suited in the art of providing humble service to another but to take that to the next level, I aspire to be a part of a team. As far as technology, I am truly inspired by the React library and it's component based architecture. While studying development, I was able to touch on a high level overview of many different technologies such as : HTML, CSS, JS, Python, Flask, MongoDB, Express, React.js, Node.js. For me, there is a sort of seamless nature to the way I can wrap my mind around React, which inspires me to continue my studies. I aspire to continue to complete a Bachelor's in Computer Science and slip into an entry level development position, so that I may acquire a real world experience of what it is really like to develop with a team and grow as a Developer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if you would like!

education.degree: Certificate of Completion, Full Stack Web Development

work.title: of Youtube React Videos
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world!

testimonials.text: Matthew is absolutely excellent and his energy really meant a lot to me... I would definitely recommend
